value.title: Is beating 1v7 INSANE AI even possible? (no, Beastyqt has not done it) #1 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I have challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 Random INSANE Cheater AIs at once! Serral has said it is impossible unless maybe they're all Zergs.
